description: This scholarship was established in 2003 by emeritus faculty member Jim Watson in memory of his late mother, Lorraine Remmel Watson. Lorraine loved dance and spent time as a performer, teacher, choreographer, administrator and ardent supporter of the art form throughout her life. Upon his mother's passing, Jim Watson established this generous endowed scholarship to honor his mother's legacy as a patron of dance. Eligibility Student in the Department of Dance Requirements AWARDED BY COMMITTEE NOMINATION. Nominated student(s) will be invited to apply by the college's scholarship coordinator

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
